data: On the top floor of one of the lesser office buildings in the insurance district of lower New York, a man stood silent before a map desk on which was laid an opened map of the burned city.
top floor of one of the lesser office buildings in the insurance district of lower New York
Kennedy, Sidney R. (Sidney Robinson), 1875-; Noble, Alden Charles, 1880-1942
